# Themes (editable)

## Packers Dark
```yaml
bg: "#1e1e1e"
fg: "#d4d4d4"
preview_bg: "#252526"
preview_fg: "#e0e0e0"
text_bg: "#2d2d2d"
text_fg: "#d4d4d4"
accent: "#FFB612"
accent_hover: "#e6a10f"
# Use the Packers green in more places (border, selection, and hover)
border: "#203731"
selected_bg: "#203731"
accent_hover: "#203731"
```
# Themes (auto-generated)
